question: Who is the first Indian triathlete to compete in Ultraman?
explanation: Anu Vaidyanathan, an Indian triathlete, is the first Asian to compete in Ultraman. Ultraman is a three-day , 515 km multisport race modelled on the one held annually on Hawaii and is called the Ultraman World Championship. Who is the youngest and 1st Indian male, to finish Ultraman at Ultraman Australia?
